info.title: Web SDK Object Manager
info.description: Handles all the information for web SDK Objects.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Constructor method. Initializes the vcs information for the object and constructs the classObject.

method.name: create

parameter.name: $phpFile
parameter.description: Indicator whether this object will have a php source code file.

parameter.name: $jsFile
parameter.description: Indicator whether this object will have a javascript file

parameter.name: $cssFile
parameter.description: Indicator whether this object will have a css file

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: remove
method.description: Removes the object from the SDK.
method.returndescription: True on success and false on failure. If there is an error, it will be returned as string.

method.name: updateSourceCode
method.description: Updates the source code of the object.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: updateSourceDoc
method.description: Updates the source documentation of the object.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: updateJSCode
method.description: Updates the javascript code of the object.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: updateCSSCode
method.description: Updates the css code of the object.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: updateCSSModel
method.description: Updates the css model of the object.

parameter.name: $model
parameter.description: The new css model in html format.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: loadSourceCode
method.description: Runs (includes) the trunk's source code file and returns the include result.

method.name: updateItem
method.description: Update the item in the working index of the vcs.

parameter.name: $forceCommit
parameter.description: Tells whether the object will be included in the next commit.

method.name: getManual
method.description: Return a path to the objects's manual file. Creates the file if it does not exist.

method.name: getObjectFullPath
method.description: Implementation of the abstract function from the parent class. Returns the full path of the object inside the repository.

method.name: getItemID
method.description: Gets the id of the current vcs item.

method.name: buildHeader
method.description: Build the source's header and returns it.

parameter.name: $phpFile
parameter.description: Indicator whether to build php source code file.

parameter.name: $jsFile
parameter.description: Indicator whether to build javascript file.

parameter.name: $cssFile
parameter.description: Indicator whether to build css file.

method.name: getItemPath
method.description: Gets the item's path (with library, package, namespace etc) for the vcs.

method.name: updateMapFile
method.description: Updates the source map index file in the vcs.
